resources.string:
Android Application to show KSM (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kernel_SamePage_Merging_%28KSM%29) status. The following values are tracked:
The following is documentation obtained from the official ksm kernel document for each value.
Run state: The current running state of ksmd. A value of 1 means it is running normally. (run)
Scan interval: how many milliseconds ksmd should sleep before next scan (sleep_millisecs)
Pages to scan: how many present pages to scan before ksmd goes to sleep (pages_to_scan)
Pages shared: how many shared pages are being used (pages_shared)
Pages sharing: how many more sites are sharing them i.e. how much saved (pages_sharing)
Pages unshared: how many pages unique but repeatedly checked for merging (pages_unshared)
Pages volatile: how many pages changing too fast to be placed in a tree (pages_volatile)
Full scans: how many times all mergeable areas have been scanned (full_scans)
Pages shared ratio: The ratio of pages shared to pages sharing, indicating the efficiency of ksmd. A lower value indicated better memory savings.
